Package view

Class AdminConsole

java.lang.Object
view.ParentConsole
view.AdminConsole
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AdminConsole extends ParentConsole
Console for the admin. Contains admin-only functions that other users like guest and movie goers can't access
Since:
2022-10-30
Version:
1.0
Author:
Roy Leong, Kish Choy
See Also:

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCinema()
    Add a new cinema
    void
    addCineplex()
    Add a new cineplex
    void
    addMovie()
    Ask the user for input to add a movie such as the title, cast, etc call the addMovie method in the MovieManager class to add it Catches and displays exceptions
    void
    addScreening()
    Allow the user to input showtime details and then add it to the Screening
    void
    deleteShowtime()
    Allow the user to delete a showtime
    void
    display(Account account)
    Allows the user to choose which option they want to do Takes in the account object and ensures that it's an admin account as only admin accounts can access this menu
    void
    getMoviesByRank()
    Ask the user for the filtering criteria to get the list of movies (filtereed by movie, cineplex etc) Calls the getMovies method in the MovieManager class to get the appropriate movies Displays the list of movies
    void
    getSalesReport()
    Asks the user for the type of sales report they want (overall, by cineplex, by movie) Call the SalesUtils's methods to get the appropriate report
    void
    removeMovie()
    Ask the user for the movie's title to remove it from the list call the removeMovie method in the MovieManager class to remove it Catches and displays exceptions
    void
    updateMovie()
    Display the current movie state Ask the user for the attributes of the movie that they want to update Update only the fields that the user changed Call the movieManager's updateMovie method to update the movie
    void
    updateShowtime()
    Allow the user to update a showtime
    void
    updateSystemConfig()
    Displays the current system configuration Asks the user to select a configuration to change Catches and displays any exceptions
